data.question: What is the crystal system of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
What radiation was used for the crystal data collection of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
What is the space group number for Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
What was the final R value obtained in the refinement of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
How many molecules of nitrobenzene per formula unit were estimated for Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
What was the maximum residual electron density found in the refinement of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
Based on the crystal data, can the density of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02 be greater than that of nitrobenzene?
data.answer: Yes, because the density of the crystals appeared marginally greater than that of nitrobenzene.

data.question: Is the Cu atom located at the origin in the crystal structure of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
Did the crystal structure determination of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02 use a full-matrix least-squares refinement method?
Was the absorption correction numerically evaluated for Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02?
Is the volume occupied by the framework of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02 less than 66% of the total unit cell volume?
data.answer: No, because the non-framework atoms occupy approximately 66%, leaving the rest for the framework.

data.question: Was the crystal of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02 mounted in Lindemann capillary tubes for data collection?
The crystal structure of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02 belongs to the Laue group 4/mmm. True or False?
The density of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02 crystals was directly measured. True or False?
The maximum residual electron density was found near the Cu atom in the crystal structure of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02. True or False?
Extinction correction was applied in the refinement of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02. True or False?
The crystal structure determination excluded six reflections due to lack of satisfactory agreement. True or False?
The BF4- anion in Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02 is assumed to occupy a spherical volume. True or False?
The crystal structure of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02 was solved using the Patterson interpretation routine. True or False?
The crystal structure of Cu[C(C6H4*CN)4]BF4, x C6H5N02 was determined without any corrections for Lorentz, polarization, and absorption effects. True or False?
